mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.org_id, d.name orgName, a.login_name, a.password, a.name, a.type, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.state, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date FROM sys_user a left join sys_org d on d.id = a.org_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.org_id, d.name orgName, a.login_name, a.password, a.name, a.email, a.phone, a.mobile, a.state, a.remarks, a.create_date, a.update_date FROM sys_user a left join sys_org d on d.id = a.org_id WHERE a.login_name = #{loginName} and a.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( id, org_id, login_name, password, name, type, email, phone, mobile, state, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{type}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{state}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update sys_user set state = #{state} where id = #{id}
